document.full_text: toshiba corp is likely to post a forecast-beating 130 billion yen ($1.6 billion ) net profit for the 2010/11 business year that ended on march 31, boosted by robust sales of flash memory chips for smartphones and tablet pcs, the nikkei business daily reported.
document.title: toshiba 2010/11 net likely to beat forecast: nikkei
lines_and_colors: toshiba corp is likely to post a forecast-beating 130 billion yen ($1.6 billion ) net profit for the 2010/11 business year that ended on march 31, boosted by robust sales of flash memory chips for smartphones and tablet pcs, the nikkei business daily reported.
